Name: Anthocyanin reflectance index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN'); ARI= (1/M1[[g]] - 1/M1[[re]]) }

Name: Ashburn Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED');  n=which(Bands=='NIR'); AVI= (2.0*M1[[n]]  - M1[[r]] ) }

Name: Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); b = which(Bands=='BLUE'); Y=1 ; ARVI= (M1[[n]]- M1[[re]] - Y*(M1[[re]]-M1[[b]]) )/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[re]] - Y*(M1[[re]]-M1[[b]]) )}

Name: Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index 2
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  n=which(Bands=='NIR'); ARVI2= (-0.18+1.17*((M1[[n]] - M1[[re]])/(M1[[n]] + M1[[re]]))  ) }

Name: Blue-wide dynamic range vegetation index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  b=which(Bands=='BLUE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; BWDRVI= (0.1*M1[[n]]-M1[[b]]) /(0.1*M1[[n]]+M1[[b]]);}

Name: Browning Reflectance Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  n=which(Bands=='NIR') ;  BRI= (1/M1[[g]]-1/M1[[re]])/M1[[n]];}

Name: Canopy Chlorophyll Content Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  r=which(Bands=='RED');  n=which(Bands=='NIR') ;  CCCI= ( ((M1[[n]]- M1[[re]])/(M1[[n]]+M1[[re]])) / ((M1[[n]]- M1[[r]])/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[r]]))) ;}

Name: Chlorophyll Absorption Ratio Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; ; CARI= M1[[re]]/M1[[r]]*sqrt(((M1[[re]]-M1[[g]])*670/150+ M1[[r]]+(M1[[g]]-((M1[[re]]-M1[[g]])*550/150)))^2 )/sqrt((M1[[re]] - M1[[g]])/(150^2) + 1)}

Name: Chlorophyll Absorption Ratio Index 2
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; a= (M1[[re]] - M1[[g]] ) /150 ; b= (M1[[g]] - (a*M1[[g]])); CARI2= M1[[re]]/M1[[r]]*abs((M1[[re]]- M1[[g]])*M1[[r]]/150+ M1[[r]]+M1[[g]]- a*M1[[g]]) /sqrt(a^2 + 1);}

Name: Chlorophyll Green
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  n=which(Bands=='NIR'); Chlgreen= (M1[[n]]/M1[[g]] )^(-1) }

Name: Chlorophyll Index Green
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  n=which(Bands=='NIR'); CIgreen= ((M1[[n]]/M1[[g]] )-1) }

Name: Chlorophyll IndexRedEdge
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  n=which(Bands=='NIR'); CIrededge= ((M1[[n]]/M1[[re]] )-1) }

Name: Chlorophyll RedEdge
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  n=which(Bands=='NIR'); Chlrededge= (M1[[n]]/M1[[re]] )^(-1) }

Name: Chlorophyll vegetation index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; n=which(Bands=='NIR');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  CVI= M1[[n]]*M1[[r]]/(M1[[g]])^2;}

Name: Coloration Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  b=which(Bands=='BLUE');  CI= (M1[[re]]- M1[[b]])/(M1[[re]]);}

Name: Corrected Transformed Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; re= which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; NDVI= (M1[[re]]-M1[[g]]) /(M1[[re]]+M1[[g]]); CTVI = ((NDVI + 0.5)*(sqrt(abs(NDVI+0.5)))/abs(NDVI+0.5));rm(NDVI); CTVI}

Name: CRI550
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; b= which(Bands=='BLUE') ; CRI550= (1/M1[[b]]-1/M1[[g]]);}

Name: CRI700
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; b= which(Bands=='BLUE') ; CRI700= (1/M1[[b]]-1/M1[[re]]);}

Name: Datt1
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; Datt1= ((M1[[n]]- M1[[re]])/(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]]));}

Name: Datt4
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN') ; Datt4= (M1[[r]]/(M1[[g]]* M1[[re]]));}

Name: Difference 678/500
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; b= which(Bands=='BLUE') ; D678500= (M1[[r]]- M1[[b]]);}

Name: Difference 840/668
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; n=which(Bands=='NIR') ; r= which(Bands=='RED') ; D840668= (M1[[n]]- M1[[r]]);}

Name: Difference NIR/Green
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; n=which(Bands=='NIR') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN') ; GDVI= (M1[[n]]- M1[[g]]);}

Name: Difference Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; DVI= M1[[n]] - M1[[r]] }

Name: Differenced Vegetation Index MSS
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; n=which(Bands=='NIR') ; r= which(Bands=='RED') ; DVIMSS= (2.4*M1[[n]]- M1[[r]]);}

Name: Enhanced Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR')  ; b= which(Bands=='BLUE'); EVI= 2.5*(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]])/((M1[[n]]+ 6*M1[[r]] - 7.5*M1[[b]]) +1  )}

Name: Enhanced Vegetation Index 2
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR')  ; EVI2= 2.5*(M1[[n]]- M1[[re]])/((M1[[n]]+ 2.4*M1[[re]] +1)   )}

Name: Enhanced Vegetation Index 3
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR')  ; EVI3= 2.4*(M1[[n]]- M1[[re]])/((M1[[n]]+ M1[[re]] +1)   )}

Name: Ferric iron, Fe3+
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN')  ; Fe3= M1[[r]]/ M1[[g]]; }

Name: Green atmospherically resistant vegetation index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  n=which(Bands=='NIR'); b=which(Bands=='BLUE') ;  GARI= (M1[[n]]-(M1[[g]]- (M1[[b]]- M1[[re]])))/(M1[[n]]-(M1[[g]]+ (M1[[b]]- M1[[re]])));}

Name: Green leaf index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  b=which(Bands=='BLUE') ;  GLI= (2*M1[[g]]- M1[[re]] - M1[[b]])/(2*M1[[g]]+ M1[[re]]+ M1[[b]]);}

Name: Green Normalized Difference Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; GNDVI= (M1[[n]]-M1[[g]]) /(M1[[n]]+M1[[g]]);}

Name: Green Optimized Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); Y=0.16 ; GOSAVI=(M1[[n]]- M1[[g]])/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[g]] + Y  )}

Name: Green Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); Y=0.16 ; GSAVI= (1+Y)*(M1[[n]]- M1[[g]])/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[g]] + Y  )}

Name: Green-Blue NDVI
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ;b=which(Bands=='BLUE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; GBNDVI= (M1[[n]]-(M1[[g]]+M1[[b]])) /(M1[[n]]+(M1[[g]]+M1[[b]]));}

Name: Green-Red NDVI
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ;re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; GBNDVI= (M1[[n]]-(M1[[g]]+M1[[re]])) /(M1[[n]]+(M1[[g]]+M1[[re]]));}

Name: Hue
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ;re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; b= which(Bands=='BLUE') ; H= atan((2*M1[[re]]- M1[[g]]-M1[[b]])*(M1[[g]]-M1[[b]])/(30.5));}

Name: Infrared percentage vegetation index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ;re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; IPVI= (((M1[[n]])/(M1[[n]]+M1[[re]]))/2)*(((M1[[re]]-M1[[g]])/(M1[[re]]- M1[[g]]))+1);}

Name: Intensity
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ;re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; b= which(Bands=='BLUE') ; I= (1/30.5)*(M1[[re]]+M1[[g]]+M1[[b]]);}

Name: Inverse reflectance 550
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN')  ; IR550= (1/M1[[g]]);}

Name: Inverse reflectance 700
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE')  ; IR700= (1/M1[[re]]);}

Name: Leaf Chlorophyll Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');  re= which(Bands=='REDEDGE');LCI= (M1[[n]]-M1[[re]]) /(M1[[n]]+M1[[r]]);}

Name: Log Ratio
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');  LogR= log10(M1[[n]]/M1[[re]]);}

Name: MCARI/MTVI2
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN'); n=which(Bands=='NIR');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  MCARI= ((M1[[re]]-M1[[r]]) -0.2*(M1[[re]]-M1[[r]]))*(M1[[re]]/M1[[r]]);Y=0.16 ; MTVI2= (1.5*(1.2*(M1[[n]]-M1[[g]]) - 2.5*(M1[[r]] - M1[[g]]))/sqrt((2*M1[[n]]+1)^2 - (6*M1[[n]] - 5*sqrt(M1[[r]]))-0.5)); MCARIMTVI2=  MCARI/MTVI2;  MCARIMTVI2; }

Name: MCARI/OSAVI
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN'); n=which(Bands=='NIR');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  MCARI= ((M1[[re]]-M1[[r]]) -0.2*(M1[[re]]-M1[[r]]))*(M1[[re]]/M1[[r]]);Y=0.16 ; OSAVI= (1+Y)*(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]])/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[r]] + Y ); MCARIOSAVI=  MCARI/OSAVI;  MCARIOSAVI; }

Name: mCRIG
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  b= which(Bands=='BLUE') ;g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');  mCRIG= (1/M1[[b]] - 1/M1[[g]])*M1[[n]];}

Name: mCRIRE
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  b= which(Bands=='BLUE') ;re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');  mCRIRE= (1/M1[[b]] - 1/M1[[re]])*M1[[n]];}

Name: Misra Green Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); MGVI= (-0.368*M1[[g]]-0.530*M1[[r]]+0.535*M1[[re]]+0.532*M1[[n]])}

Name: Misra Non Such Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); MSBI= (0.404*M1[[g]]-0.039*M1[[r]]-0.505*M1[[re]]+0.762*M1[[n]])}

Name: Misra Soil Brightness Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); MSBI= (0.406*M1[[g]]+0.6*M1[[r]]+0.645*M1[[re]]−0.243*M1[[n]])}

Name: Misra Yellow Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); MYVI= (0.723*M1[[g]]-0.597*M1[[r]]+0.206*M1[[re]]-0.278*M1[[n]])}

Name: mND680
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');  b= which(Bands=='BLUE');mND680= (M1[[n]]-M1[[r]]) /(M1[[n]]+M1[[r]]-2*M1[[b]]);}

Name: Modified anthocyanin reflectance index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re= which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ;g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');  mARI= (1/M1[[g]] - 1/M1[[re]])*M1[[n]];}

Name: Modified Chlorophyll Absorption in Reflectance Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  MCARI= ((M1[[re]]-M1[[r]]) -0.2*(M1[[re]]-M1[[r]]))*(M1[[re]]/M1[[r]]);}

Name: Modified Chlorophyll Absorption in Reflectance Index 1
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  n=which(Bands=='NIR') ;  MCARI1= (1.2*(2.5*(M1[[n]]-M1[[r]])- 1.3*(M1[[n]] - M1[[g]])));}

Name: Modified Chlorophyll Absorption in Reflectance Index 2
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  n=which(Bands=='NIR') ;  MCARI2= (1.5*(2.5*(M1[[n]]-M1[[r]])- 1.3*(M1[[n]] - M1[[g]])))/sqrt((2*M1[[n]]+1)^2- (6*M1[[n]]-5*sqrt(M1[[r]]))-0.5);}

Name: Modified Secondary Soil- Adjusted Vegetation Index (MSAVI2)
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ;  MSAVI2= 0.5*((2*M1[[n]]-1)- sqrt((2*M1[[n]]+1)^2 - 8*(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]])) )}

Name: Modified Simple Ratio
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); b= which(Bands=='BLUE');mSR= (M1[[n]]-M1[[b]]) /(M1[[r]]+M1[[b]]);}

Name: Modified Simple Ratio 670,800
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');MSR670= (M1[[n]]/M1[[r]] - 1) /sqrt(M1[[n]]/M1[[r]] +1);}

Name: Modified Simple Ratio NIR/RED
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');MSRNirRed= (M1[[n]]/M1[[re]] - 1) /sqrt(M1[[n]]/M1[[re]] +1);}

Name: Modified Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');MSAVI= (2*M1[[n]] + 1 - sqrt((2*M1[[n]]+ 1)^2 - 8*(M1[[n]]- M1[[re]]))) /2;}

Name: Modified Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index hyper
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');MSAVIhy= (2*M1[[n]] + 1 - sqrt((2*M1[[n]]+ 1)^2 - 8*(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]]))) /2;}

Name: Modified Triangular Vegetation Index 1
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');MTVI1= (1.2*(1.2*(M1[[n]]-M1[[g]]) - 2.5*(M1[[r]] - M1[[g]])));}

Name: Modified Triangular Vegetation Index 2
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');MTVI2= (1.5*(1.2*(M1[[n]]-M1[[g]]) - 2.5*(M1[[r]] - M1[[g]]))/sqrt((2*M1[[n]]+1)^2 - (6*M1[[n]] - 5*sqrt(M1[[r]]))-0.5));}

Name: New Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); b = which(Bands=='BLUE'); Y=0.65 ; IRVI= (M1[[n]]- M1[[r]] - Y*(M1[[r]]-M1[[b]]) )/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[r]] - Y*(M1[[r]]-M1[[b]]) )}

Name: new Double Difference Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');DDn= (2*(M1[[re]] - M1[[n]] - M1[[n]]));}

Name: Nonlinear vegetation index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');NLI= ((M1[[n]]^2 - M1[[re]])/(M1[[n]]^2 + M1[[re]]));}

Name: Norm G
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');NormG= ((M1[[g]])/(M1[[re]]+M1[[n]]+M1[[g]]));}

Name: Norm NIR
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');NormN= ((M1[[n]])/(M1[[re]]+M1[[n]]+M1[[g]]));}

Name: Norm R
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');NormR= ((M1[[re]])/(M1[[re]]+M1[[n]]+M1[[g]]));}

Name: Normalized Difference 560/475
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  b=which(Bands=='BLUE') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN') ; PPR= (M1[[g]]-M1[[b]]) /(M1[[g]]+M1[[b]]);}

Name: Normalized Difference 560/668
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN') ; PPR= (M1[[g]]-M1[[r]]) /(M1[[g]]+M1[[r]]);}

Name: Normalized Difference 668/560
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN') ; ND682553= (M1[[r]]-M1[[g]]) /(M1[[r]]+M1[[g]]);}

Name: Normalized Difference 840/668
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ;   ND774677 = (M1[[n]]-M1[[r]]) /(M1[[n]]+M1[[r]]);}

Name: Normalized Difference NIR/Green
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ;   GNDVI = (M1[[n]]-M1[[g]]) /(M1[[n]]+M1[[g]]);}

Name: Normalized Difference Green/Red
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; re= which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ;   NGRDI  = (M1[[re]]-M1[[g]]) /(M1[[re]]+M1[[g]]);}

Name: Normalized Difference NIR/Blue
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  n=which(Bands=='NIR') ; b= which(Bands=='BLUE') ;   BNDVI  = (M1[[n]]-M1[[b]]) /(M1[[n]]+M1[[b]]);}

Name: Normalized Difference NIR/Rededge
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ;     NDRE  = (M1[[n]]-M1[[re]]) /(M1[[n]]+M1[[re]]);}

Name: Normalized Difference Red/Green
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN') ;     RI = (M1[[re]]-M1[[g]]) /(M1[[re]]+M1[[g]]);}

Name: Normalized Difference Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; NDVI= (M1[[n]]-M1[[r]]) /(M1[[n]]+M1[[r]]);}

Name: normalized saturation-value difference index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ;  b=which(Bands=='BLUE') ; nc = M1@ncols; nr = M1@nrows; rgb_mat<- cbind(R=c(((as.matrix(M1[[r]])))), G=c((as.matrix(M1[[g]]))), B=c((as.matrix(M1[[b]])))); max_rgb <-apply(rgb_mat, 1, max); min_rgb <-apply(rgb_mat, 1, min); v_mat <- max_rgb; mm <- max_rgb-min_rgb; s_mat <- mm/v_mat; NSVDI =(s_mat - v_mat)/(s_mat + v_mat); NSVDI= matrix(NSVDI, nrow=nr,ncol=nc);}

Name: Optimized Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); Y=0.16 ; OSAVI= (1+Y)*(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]])/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[r]] + Y  )}

Name: Pan NDVI
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ;b=which(Bands=='BLUE') ; g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); Y=0.16 ; PNDVI= (M1[[n]]- (M1[[g]] +  M1[[re]] + M1[[b]] ))/(M1[[n]] + (M1[[g]] +  M1[[re]] + M1[[b]] ))}

Name: Ratio Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); RVI= M1[[r]] /M1[[n]]}

Name: RDVI
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; RDVI= (M1[[n]]-M1[[r]]) /sqrt(M1[[n]]+M1[[r]]);}

Name: Red edge 1
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; re= which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; Rededge1= M1[[re]] /M1[[r]];}

Name: Red edge 2
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; re= which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; Rededge2= (M1[[re]] - M1[[r]]) /(M1[[re]] + M1[[r]]);}

Name: Red-Blue NDVI
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE'); b=which(Bands=='BLUE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; RBNDVI = (M1[[n]]-(M1[[re]]+ M1[[b]])) /(M1[[n]]+(M1[[re]]+ M1[[b]]));}

Name: Reflectance at the inflexion point
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; Rre= (M1[[n]]+M1[[r]]) /(2);}

Name: Shape Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;    b=which(Bands=='BLUE'); g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ; re= which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; IF= (2*M1[[re]]-M1[[g]]- M1[[b]]) /(M1[[g]]- M1[[b]]);}

FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;    b=which(Bands=='BLUE');  re= which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; Lic2= (M1[[b]]) /(M1[[re]]);}

Name: Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); Y=0.5 ; SAVI= (1+Y)*(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]])/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[r]] + Y  )}

Name: Soil and Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index 2
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); b=which(Bands=='BLUE');  SARVI2= (2.5)*(M1[[n]]- M1[[re]])/(1+M1[[n]]+ 6*M1[[re]] -  7.5*M1[[b]] )}

Name: Soil and Atmospherically Resistant Vegetation Index 3
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');   SAVI3= (1.5)*(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]])/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[r]]+0.5)}

Name: Soil Background Line
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR');   SBL= (M1[[n]]- 2.4*M1[[r]])}

Name: Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; Y=0.65 ; SAVI= (M1[[n]]- M1[[r]])*(1+Y) /(M1[[n]]+ M1[[r]]+ Y )}

Name: Spectral Polygon Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; g=which(Bands=='GREEN')  ; SPVI= 0.4*(3.7*(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]] ) - 1.2* abs(M1[[g]]- M1[[r]]))}

Name: SQRT(IR/R)
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  n= which(Bands=='NIR'); sq= sqrt(M1[[n]]/M1[[re]])}

Name: Structure Intensive Pigment Index 1
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; b=which(Bands=='BLUE'); r=which(Bands=='RED');  n= which(Bands=='NIR'); SIPI1= ((M1[[n]] - M1[[b]])/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[r]]))}

Name: Structure Intensive Pigment Index 2
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; b=which(Bands=='BLUE'); re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  n= which(Bands=='NIR'); SIPI2= ((M1[[n]] - M1[[b]])/(M1[[n]]- M1[[re]]))}

Name: Tasselled Cap - Green Vegetation Index MSS
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); GVIMSS = (−0.283*M1[[g]]- 0.660*M1[[r]]+0.577*M1[[re]] + 0.388*M1[[n]]);  GVIMSS}

Name: Tasselled Cap - Non Such Index MSS
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); NSIMSS= (−0.016*M1[[g]]+0.131*M1[[r]]- 0.425*M1[[re]] + 0.882*M1[[n]]); NSIMSS}

Name: Tasselled Cap - Soil Brightness Index MSS
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); SBIMSS= (0.332*M1[[g]]+0.603*M1[[r]]+0.675*M1[[re]]+0.262*M1[[n]])}

Name: Tasselled Cap - Yellow Vegetation Index MSS
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); YVI= (−0.899*M1[[g]]+0.428*M1[[r]]+0.076*M1[[re]]−0.041*M1[[n]])}

Name: TCARI/OSAVI
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR'); re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN'); Y=0.16 ; OSAVI= (1+Y)*(M1[[n]]- M1[[r]])/(M1[[n]]+ M1[[r]] + Y ) ; TCARI= 3*((M1[[re]] - M1[[r]]) - 0.2*(M1[[re]] - M1[[g]])*(M1[[re]]/M1[[r]])); d= TCARI/OSAVI; d}

Name: Transformed Chlorophyll Absorbtion Ratio
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {; re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE');  g=which(Bands=='GREEN');  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; TCARI= 3*((M1[[re]] - M1[[r]]) - 0.2*(M1[[re]] - M1[[g]])*(M1[[re]]/M1[[r]]))}

Name: Transformed NDVI
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; TNDVI= sqrt((M1[[n]]-M1[[re]]) /(M1[[n]]+M1[[re]]) + 0.5);}

Name: Transformed Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN') ; TVI= sqrt((M1[[re]]-M1[[g]]) /(M1[[re]]+M1[[g]]) + 0.5);}

Name: Triangular chlorophyll index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN') ; TCI=(1.2*(M1[[re]]- M1[[g]]) - 1.5*(M1[[r]]- M1[[g]])*sqrt(M1[[re]]/M1[[r]]));}

Name: Vegetation Index 700
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; VI700=((M1[[re]]- M1[[r]]) /(M1[[re]]+M1[[r]]));}

Name: Visible Atmospherically Resistant Index Green
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  g=which(Bands=='GREEN') ;  b=which(Bands=='BLUE') ; VariGREEN=((M1[[g]]- M1[[r]]) /(M1[[g]]+M1[[r]] - M1[[b]]));}

Name: Visible Atmospherically Resistant Indices 700
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;b=which(Bands=='BLUE')   ; r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; VARI700=((M1[[re]]- 1.7*M1[[r]] + 0.7*M1[[b]]) /(M1[[re]]+ 2.3*M1[[r]] - 1.3*M1[[b]]));}

Name: Visible Atmospherically Resistant Indices RedEdge
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ;  re=which(Bands=='REDEDGE') ; VARIrededge=((M1[[re]]- M1[[r]]) /(M1[[re]]+M1[[r]]));}

Name: Visible-Band Difference Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; g= which(Bands=='GREEN') ; b= which(Bands=='BLUE'); VDVI= (2*M1[[g]]-M1[[r]] -M1[[b]]) /(2*M1[[g]]+M1[[r]]+M1[[b]]);}

Name: Wide Dynamic Range Vegetation Index
FORMULA: function(Bands,M1) {;  r=which(Bands=='RED') ; n= which(Bands=='NIR') ; WDRVI= (0.1*M1[[n]]-M1[[r]]) /(0.1*M1[[n]]+M1[[r]]);}
